> **Data Sources**  
> I gather match data from a variety of public sources. Please check out these excellent websites that make projects like this possible:  
> - [Club Elo Ratings](https://clubelo.com)
> - [ESPN](https://espn.com/)
> - [FBref](https://fbref.com)  
> - [FotMob](https://fotmob.com/)
> - [Transfermarkt](https://transfermarkt.com)  
> - [Understat](https://understat.com)  
> - [WhoScored](https://whoscored.com/)
> - [World Football Elo Ratings](https://eloratings.net/)
